name: britannia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an image of a woman, usually wearing a helmet and holding a shield and trident (= a weapon with three points), that is used as a symbol of Britain
literary or formal Britain: that symbol of Britannia, the red telephone booth Rule Britannia (also Rule, Britannia!)
a British patriotic song (= one that expresses pride in one's country) that is sometimes played at public events: The band started to play "Rule Britannia".
